author: onassisxbt
content: Anyone got an Etherscan API key?

author: trent_vanepps
content: please stop asking this in multiple channels.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Well it's a reorg between the same block, so it should be impossible

author: ryanleeschneider
content: So for context <@!360491619402776577> our ropsten nodes are archive nodes so I'm trying to avoid syncing them from genesis if at all possible, so was hoping `debug.setHead` would be able to force a reorg to the new chain

author: ryanleeschneider
content: I'll see if adding a `--whitelist` entry for the new block 538 helps

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: It should be, if not than you need to wait until our chain overtakes the old chain

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: You could also connect to me directly, dming you my enode

author: ryanleeschneider
content: also trying again with `--whitelist=10679538=0x569dccc25294768c23249db843ef7156e8e7c6c94cb82cd84a833f9c3e1d72e5` to see if that helps

author: ryanleeschneider
content: ^ ok between the whitelist option and adding you as a peer it seems to be on the new chain now ðŸŽ‰ .  This was actually just a throwaway test node that was fast sycned I'll try again on a "real" archive node after I grab some lunch.  Thanks for helping out!

author: ryanleeschneider
content: <@!153017054545444864> luckily this node was fast synced but ages ago so it's basically been in full sync mode for several months, and most of our testnet user-facing nodes are archive nodes
